title: Build a Production-Ready RAG Pipeline
subtitle: Learn how to build, deploy, and scale a Retrieval-Augmented Generation pipeline with modern AI tools
description: A comprehensive, hands-on tutorial that teaches you how to build a production-ready RAG pipeline from scratch. Learn best practices, optimization techniques, and real-world implementation strategies.

features.description: Master techniques for optimizing retrieval quality, reducing latency, and scaling your pipeline efficiently

testimonials.content: This tutorial helped me understand RAG pipelines deeply. The production-ready approach saved me weeks of trial and error.
Excellent balance of theory and practice. The optimization techniques section was particularly valuable for our production deployment.

faqs.question: What experience level is required?
faqs.answer: You should have basic Python programming experience and familiarity with machine learning concepts. No prior RAG or LLM experience is required.

faqs.question: What technologies are covered?
faqs.answer: We use Python, LangChain, OpenAI's APIs, ChromaDB, and FastAPI. The tutorial includes complete environment setup instructions.

faqs.question: Is the code production-ready?
faqs.answer: Yes! The codebase follows production best practices including error handling, logging, monitoring, and scalability considerations.
